abstract: Last night, Tod's had a cocktail party at the Italian Embassy for its new signature collection, followed by a dinner that attracted a lot of editors in chief, along with Lee Radziwill, Marissa Berenson, Rachel Zoe and assorted Casiraghis and Courtin-Clarinses.
snippet: Last night, Tod's had a cocktail party at the Italian Embassy for its new signature collection, followed by a dinner that attracted a lot of editors in chief, along with Lee Radziwill, Marissa Berenson, Rachel Zoe and assorted Casiraghis and...
lead_paragraph: Last night, Tod's had a cocktail party at the Italian Embassy for its new signature collection, followed by a dinner that attracted a lot of editors in chief, along with Lee Radziwill, Marisa Berenson, Rachel Zoe and assorted Casiraghis and Courtin-Clarinses. It was a little fancy for me, and I found myself going over the hits and misses of the week with Hal Rubenstein and Nina Garcia, who both liked Riccardo Tisci's strong tailoring this season for Givenchy.
